formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A DOMAIN ERROR in AnchorVars[11] occurs in Test 17, Increment 5, with the following message:

listitem.screen: AnchorVars[11] z k l r i←(⊃⍪/)¨↓⍉ep s⌸edn

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: On a namespace without any expression bindings, we need to handle the case correctly. In this case, we were dereferencing when we should not have been. We insert a short circuit to eliminate this issue.
